statements: SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules
SELECT rule_id, location_name, radius FROM geofencing_rules
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius > 10
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius BETWEEN 5 AND 20
SELECT notification_message, rule_id FROM geofencing_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE location_name = 'Home' ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT rule_id, location_name, notification_message FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius > 100 ORDER BY latitude ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE notification_message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY rule_id ASC, location_name DESC;
SELECT notification_message, radius FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius < 50 AND location_name IN ('School', 'Work') ORDER BY radius DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius > 10
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules ORDER BY location_name ASC
SELECT notification_message FROM geofencing_rules WHERE rule_id = 3
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT current_latitude, current_longitude FROM user_locations ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE location_name='Home';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT rule_id, location_name, radius FROM geofencing_rules ORDER BY radius DESC;
SELECT rule_id, notification_message FROM geofencing_rules WHERE rule_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, current_latitude, current_longitude FROM user_locations;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE rule_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius > 100;
SELECT notification_message FROM geofencing_rules WHERE location_name = 'Home';

SELECT user_id, notification_timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;

SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT notification_message FROM geofencing_rules WHERE location_name = 'Home';
SELECT user_id, notification_timestamp FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT rule_id, location_name, latitude, longitude, notification_message FROM geofencing_rules LEFT JOIN notifications ON geofencing_rules.rule_id = notifications.rule_id;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofencing_rules WHERE radius > 100 ORDER BY rule_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofencing_rules WHERE location_name LIKE 'Central%' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT user_id, notification_message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT id, name FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id > 100;
SELECT u.username, n.message FROM users u JOIN notifications n ON u.id = n.user_id;
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT id, name FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, message, triggered_at FROM notifications ORDER BY triggered_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, g.name, n.message FROM users u JOIN proximity_triggers pt ON u.id = pt.user_id JOIN notifications n ON pt.notification_id = n.id JOIN geofences g ON pt.geofence_id = g.id;
SELECT u.username, h.triggered_at FROM users u JOIN user_history h ON u.id = h.user_id WHERE h.geofence_id = 1;
